DOC.brief_title: Palliative Care Intervention Patients With Solid Tumors Participating Phase I Clinical Trials
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . Describe feasibility implement PCI patient phase I clinical trial ( study accrual retention ) . II . Describe initial impact PCI key patient outcome measure ( quality life [ QOL ] , psychological distress , satisfaction communication , symptom intensity , symptom distress , patient satisfaction ) time . OUTLINE : PCI PART I : Patients undergo comprehensive palliative care ( PC ) assessment base baseline data complete goal care discussion . PCI PART II : Following first dose phase I investigational treatment , patient meet interdisciplinary team ( IDT ) , PC recommendation make . This follow two patient educational session cover QOL-related domain , include physical , social , emotional , spiritual well-being . Supportive care referral make base IDT recommendation .
